episodes.title: The Beach
episodes.plot: Shy college student Nasir Khan spends the night with a quirky, mysterious girl, and is horrified when he awakens to find she has been murdered.

episodes.title: Subtle Beast
episodes.plot: As attorney John Stone counsels Naz, lead detective Dennis Box investigates the crime.

episodes.title: A Dark Crate
episodes.plot: At Rikers Island, Naz realises that his survival, or perhaps his demise, rests with an inmate named Freddy Knight, while Stone is double crossed.

episodes.title: The Art of War
episodes.plot: A fellow prisoner advises Naz on prison life while he weighs the pros and cons of copping a plea, and Stone delves into Andrea's past.

episodes.title: The Season of the Witch
episodes.plot: Box reconstructs Naz's whereabouts on the night of Andrea's death, Stone looks into other potential suspects, and Naz is pulled further into the murkiness of prison life.

episodes.title: Samson and Delilah
episodes.plot: As prosecutor Helen Weiss prepares for trial, Chandra follows a potential new lead, and Naz's alliance with Freddy deepens.

episodes.title: Ordinary Death
episodes.plot: As the defense presents its case, Box's actions on the night of the murder are called into question, and tragedy strikes at Rikers.

episodes.title: The Call of the Wild
episodes.plot: A controversy surrounding the defense puts Stone in the spotlight as Naz's trial reaches its climax.
